review: I was so excited to use this product, but was unable to. We tried hooking it up to two separate TVs, but kept getting the error message "Signal unavailable." When I called for support I was informed that there would be no support for it because neither of my TVs have an HDMI port. I had to buy an HDMI to VGA converter,  but apparently the Kindle Fire TV is not eligible for TVs that have a VGA port and need a converter.I really wish this was made clear in the product specifications before I'd ordered, but thankfully Amazon is refunding my purchase price.
